variables.name: Intensity Sum Normalised per Nucleus
variables.desc: For each image, each object, each channel, the Intensity Sum of the object is divided by the Intensity Sum in the Surface "Nucleus"

variables.name: Intensity Mean Normalised per Nucleus
variables.desc: For each image, each object, each channel, the Intensity Mean of the object is divided by the Intensity Mean in the Surface "Nucleus"

variables.name: Intensity StdDev Normalised per Nucleus
variables.desc: For each image, each object, each channel, the Intensity StdDev of the object is divided by the Intensity StdDev in the Surface "Nucleus"

variables.name: Intensity Sum Normalised by Group
variables.desc: For each object, each channel, the Intensity Sum is divided by the Group Intensity Sum

variables.name: Intensity Mean Normalised by Group
variables.desc: For each object, each channel, the Intensity Mean is divided by the Group Intensity Mean

variables.name: Ratio of Intensity Sum Normalised per Nucleus
variables.desc: For each object, the ratio is made between the values: Intensity Sum Normalized per Nucleus

variables.name: Ratio of Intensity Sum Normalised by Group
variables.desc: For each object, the ratio is made between the values: Intensity Sum Normalized by Group

variables.name: Normalized Distance to Nucleus
variables.comment: SHOULD BE Distance Normalized per Nucleus

variables.name: Volume Relative to Group
variables.desc: Per object, the Volume is divided by the Group Volume in the same image

variables.name: Group Surface Area
variables.desc: The surface of objects belonging to the same group, same image, are summed up

variables.name: Object Count
variables.comment: SHOULD BE Object Count per Group

variables.name: Group Intensity Sum
variables.desc: For a given group of objects carrying the same name, the Intensity Sums are added up (Sum of Intensity Sum)

variables.name: Group Intensity Sum Relative to Nucleus
Group Intensity Mean Relative to Nucleus
